storyInfo: After her long disappearance, Ines finally reappears before the Doctor, while Logos catches the Damazti Cluster, who has been disguising themselves as Molly, red-handed. The riots in Norport Borough are getting further and further out of control.

attributes.content: How quick to answer, Doctor of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: A safe location has been sent to Alexandrina's terminal. Please stand by there. I cannot guarantee your safety for any actions you take outside of our arrangement.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: My terminal? When did...?!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You have some impressive talents among your ranks. That's very good. This should contribute to our common goal instead of becoming an obstacle to our cooperation.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Right?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.options: This isn't completely up to us.;......;Is it a Victorian thing to call threats cooperation?

attributes.content: Of course. We must slowly build our trust.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: A cautious silence. How admirable.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Regrettably, yes.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Please await our next communication.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Doctor, I need to contact Closure and reevaluate the safety of Rhodes Island's communications. Until then, maintain radio silence.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Of course, we also need to... take care of the issues regarding the landship's calling procedures.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Thank you, Ines.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Hello, Ines. Is this the first time we've met?

attributes.content: I'm afraid not.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.options: I've lost... some of my memories.

attributes.content: I'm aware.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: This is our first meeting, for this version of you.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Have you really lost your memories...? Or is this part of your plan?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.options: I forgot about lots of things, indeed.;......;What makes you ask that?

attributes.content: I've never been quick to judge, Dr. {@nickname}. I can sense that you've gone through some... changes.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: We'll have a lot of time to get reacquainted in the future.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Rather than trusting verbal statements, I prefer to see things for myself.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Ines, the Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Relax, Amiya. My prejudices won't be a factor.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: For now.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: The evacuation's almost complete!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Good, we need to get out of here ASAP.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: That Sarkaz from Rhodes Island. Is his name Logos?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: And I thought we'd seen all the surprises Rhodes Island's fighting style had to offer, having fought alongside Misery all this time.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Right. It doesn't matter who exactly he is. His cursecraft has been a great help.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Hah... and he's a great darts player, too.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: I played against him for a couple rounds. His accuracy might just be as terrifying as those Arts of his.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: A friend of mine taught me a couple tricks before, that's all.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: He's no match for me in a chair sliding match, but when it comes to darts... He's not so bad.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Horn, the Sarkaz forces have retreated. We should seize this opportunity.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: According to the plan, Rhodes Island and the Self-Salvation Corps will take the supply route, head toward the exit, and make their way to a town called Brentwood to build a new safe house there.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We will regroup with them there.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I suggest we charge toward the city walls. Norport Borough is gone, and even though the Sarkaz have patched up the walls, they wouldn't have had enough time to build new plates to fill the hole there.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The exposed underground structure might just help us somehow.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Looks like I've met another old friend.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The one who taught you to play darts.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Regrettably, no.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Unlike this old friend, my friends are loyal to one another until our deaths.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Everyone, I'm afraid I still have matters to attend to within the city. Horn is more than capable of leading you outside Londinium, and my coworker Misery will also lend you his assistance should the need arise.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Stay hidden, everyone. Follow me.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Are the mountains of the past really so worthy of reminiscing? Blood and tears are nothing to be obsessed with.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I must say I'm not entirely fascinated by them.
attributes.name: 'Molly'

attributes.content: But what if the mountains are the only place there is left to stay? What if only the light of glory there can give us warmth?
attributes.name: 'Molly'

attributes.content: And here I thought I'd hunted enough of you.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: This is the thirty-first 'Molly.' You are a hardworking one, Banshee.
attributes.name: 'Molly'

attributes.content: But you prevailed nonetheless. You helped Theresis decimate the Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: That's business.
attributes.name: 'Molly'

attributes.content: I would pry up every tile in Londinium to find the last of your hidden shards, Damazti.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: You yet refute the possibility of change. This has always been your choice.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: A little arrogant, aren't we, young Banshee? We understand change. We come from change itself.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: But change is merely a means to adaptation. All change has a final objective.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Even before the Sarkaz found themselves in this state, we had long been walking upon the lands.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Ideologies, faiths, missions, slogans. None of them can escape the sands of time.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Those ideas you mistake as novel have been conceived long ago. The paths you deem noble have been paved time and again.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: And where are they now?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We yet still before you.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: And that is the greatest proof.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: (Bang!)
(Bang, bang!)
Phew—
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: You should save some strength, Cador. You've eaten more than enough.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Delphine has talked to you about your appetite problem already. We're much worse off than we used to be now.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Relax, Baird. Things haven't completely gone to shit yet.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Them devils aren't nearly as strong as they look. All they did was catch us off-guard.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: I had a chat with Marshall from the transport union. They have a group of men over there. Once we rope in more people on our end, we might just stand a chance to defeat the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Just like how we joined forces with those other gangs to take the cops down.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Jump them from behind, get the job done clean. 'Pow pow,' 'bam!'
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: A couple punches. That's all it takes.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: The Sarkaz army isn't cops.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I know. They're a force to be reckoned with.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: But we aren't afraid of blood. We aren't afraid of sacrifices! We will walk over our fallen comrades, and smash their faces in with our fists—
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Like our gym's name, 'Slobberknocker!'
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Marshall and I worked it out. We will definitely win!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Just like those bootleg Lungmen videos you collect, hm?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I'm serious, I've been around the block in Norport not much shorter than you.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: We need to find a way out of this mess ourselves just like before.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: That Siege of yours just up and left Glasgow all those years ago, and our turf got handed over, just like that. It was you and I who racked our brains to figure out how to gain a foothold here again.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: This is nothing different than before. We stand together, get prepared, and beat them all up. That's how we've made it this far.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: It doesn't matter how things are outside. Out on the streets, we do things the street way.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Next, we just gotta find ourselves the right moment...
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Looks like Delphine's back.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Did Ol' Baldy Per finally give in? Given the circumstances, we're paying a pretty decent price. I'm sure he—
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: What's this? Is that... blood?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Ol' Baldy Per is dead.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The Sarkaz—
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: No, not the Sarkaz! Dammit, I have no idea who they were, but they were already at it when we got to the store!
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: They were a bloodthirsty bunch! I saw with my own eyes there was this man with a crowbar, pinning another man on the floor. That man even—
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*, *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: The situation's bad. My guess is some starving bum set his sights on Per's shop. The idiot still had bread in his glass showcase.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: And it went as you'd expect.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: You can more or less guess just how many of these 'bums' there are in this locked-down district.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Bloody idiots... Whatever they have been sniffing must've finally got to their heads!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: I know the man with the crowbar. He's a tail hair product salesman. Always had a smile on his face.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I bought from him a number of times since he gave me discounts. They aren't all that good, though.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I saw him just now... His eyes were deep red, there was blood on his lips. That crowbar was completely bent. I... I almost didn't recognize him.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Fear is spreading, Cador.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The transport union guys did say there could be cowards going nuts, but how could...
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Barricade the door!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: What are you spacing out for? Make yourself useful! Cador, push that sofa over here!
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Bloody bastards, what do the lot of you want?!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Now piss off, we've got people alive in here. This is Glasgow's territory!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Baird, watch out!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: A fire axe smashes through the gym's thick door and breaks open a hole. The sharp axe brushes past Baird's hair.
A few strands of her hair flutter in the air.
I said it already. We've got people still bloody alive in here!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Cador presses against the door with his body and grabs the axe peeking through the hole back with his two hands. The man outside makes several attempts to pull the axe back in vain.
I don't care who the hell you are, but get out of my sight, or I'll have this axe in your brain!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: The axe wobbles a few times, and after a few heavy kicking sounds on the door, the men outside finally gives up, their chaotic footsteps slowly growing quieter.
Your hand... Your fingers...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Good thing that bandages are the last thing we'll run out of in a gym.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Baird, Delphine. We need to take inventory of all our resources again.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: I'll take down a couple sandbags to reinforce our front door.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Th-These people... Have they gone mad?!
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: They... The citizens of Norport Borough were all upstanding men, basically... What about the police? They were always so quick to write tickets!
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: If I were a cop so unlucky as to not make it out of this plate in time, I would definitely have locked myself in my home with my weapon at the ready by now.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: I... I need to head on over to the transport union later. The people here still trust Marshall.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: He—Everyone always listens to him. He'll find a way.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Dammit... Bloody hell! The Sarkaz are still out there. These people are out of their minds. How could they—
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: What... What should we do now? Cador said we just had to wait for...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: An opportunity?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Mr. 'Next Academician,' are you aware of the great fire in Norport fifteen years ago?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Oh, yes, I've heard. It was in the port, if I recall...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: It doesn't actually take very much to burn down a port.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: All you need is scorching hot weather, a warehouse full of wood shavings, and a cigarette butt not fully extinguished.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: No one can put out a fire like that.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: All we can do is watch everything burn to ashes.
attributes.name: Baird
